titleInfo.title: A tracing of Arabic plan showing land at Juffair acquired by the British Government for Naval Base

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on tracing clothDimensions:266 x 240 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Copied in Air Headquarters, Iraq at Hinaidi.A tracing of Arabic plan relating to the deed of purchase for the land designated for the Naval Base situated at Ras Al Jufair about 3 miles south of Manamah. The extent of the land shown in red, properties labelled with ownersâ€™ names and dimensions reported.
